item.title: CVE-2022-45835|2024-09-03T19:03:26.931Z -- phonepe -- phonepe%20payment%20solutions
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in PhonePe PhonePe Payment Solutions.This issue affects PhonePe Payment Solutions: from n/a through 1.0.15.
